column3:
Keypool is from #4347.

This fixes:

```
$ qa/pull-tester/rpc-tests.py keypool --coverage
Initializing coverage directory at /tmp/coveragerTt3hc
Running 2nd level testscript keypool.py...
Usage: keypool.py [options]

keypool.py: error: no such option: --coveragedir
```
@laanwj any reason you didn't do this as part of #4347?\n

> @laanwj any reason you didn't do this as part of #4347?

Probably didn't know about it yet, or even didn't exist yet when I started working on it. 

utACK anyhow
